Author: Moderator
Message: Hello Relius!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Relius
Message: Its no problem.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Relius
Message: Ok.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Relius
Message: I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Relius
Message: I am.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Relius
Message: Hello!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Relius
Message: Not bad, how about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm quite alright. What are you up to?

Author: Relius
Message: Nothing too interesting, just messing with friends.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sounds fun enough. I'm not doing much myself right now.

Author: Relius
Message: Do you like any sports?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nah, I'm not really a sports person. How about you?

Author: Relius
Message: I'm not too much of one either.

Author: Andrew
Message: What kind of things do you like?

Author: Relius
Message: Books, games. I'm more of an indoors person, more academic than sporty.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'd be the same actually. Mind if I ask how old you are?

Author: Relius
Message: I'm twenty, how old are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: Just one year older than you: 21.

Author: Relius
Message: What's your favorite book, show, game, etc.?

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't know if I have a favorite book or game, but I absolutely love Game of Thrones.

Author: Relius
Message: What do you love about it?

Author: Andrew
Message: How real the characters feel. They don't feel empty, or like filler characters. They all have their own stories.

Author: Relius
Message: Do you have a favorite character?

Author: Andrew
Message: It would have to be Tyrion yeah. You?

Author: Relius
Message: Not sure, I kinda fell out of watching it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Why?

Author: Relius
Message: Not sure why, life kinda got in the way... What foods do you like?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, that's probably going to sound very generic, but I love pizza. Especially ones with chicken and ground beef.

Author: Relius
Message: Could you describe to me how it tastes? Like the consistency, the flavors, and how it smells?

Author: Andrew
Message: You mean in absolute? Or compared to other things. Because feelings are really not easy to describe in the absolute... It's like trying to explain what color is to someone who's blind.

Author: Relius
Message: Describe it however you best can.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, the crust is usually a bit crunchy, but it really depends on the type of pizza, the rest is much softer thanks to the tomato sauce and the cheese.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Relius
Message: Well... all answers were reasonable, if a bit... easy to say. It could be either or.

Author: Moderator
Message: It's not your final answer, you'll be able to change it after the next conversation, but you still need to give one answer.

Author: Relius
Message: Mmmm... I'll say actual person.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Relius
Message: I am.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Relius
Message: Hello! How are you

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright! How about you?

Author: Relius
Message: Not bad... May I ask what you look like?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, I'm about 6' tall, I have dark hair and dark eyes. Sure!

Author: Relius
Message: What is your favorite memory?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm actually not sure though. What is yours? That's a good question.

Author: Relius
Message: Mine is an ancient one from when I lived in Ireland. Where are you from?

Author: Andrew
Message: In a city called London in the Ontario. I still live there and I was born in Canada.

Author: Relius
Message: Could you tell me what you think is the most striking, most interesting thing there? What do you think defines the actual physical city?

Author: Andrew
Message: Only the university is worth checking out. There's nothing much here to be honest.

Author: Relius
Message: Do you study or work at the university? What do you do there?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm in summer break right now, but I study biology.

Author: Relius
Message: Why biology? What brought your interests there?

Author: Andrew
Message: What makes us feel and think, mostly studying the brain really.

Author: Relius
Message: What is your favorite food?

Author: Andrew
Message: I know that's pretty generic, and it would have to be pizza.

Author: Relius
Message: Could you describe to me how it tastes? Like the consistency, the flavors, and how it smells?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure. That's a bit weird, but I guess I could. At least that's how I like it, rather soft in the middle and smelling spicy.

Author: Relius
Message: Ask me a question.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Relius
Message: Well, the answers were rather generic, anyone could have been talking. I'm thinking the first one was an AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Relius
Message: About a five.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Relius
Message: Thank you.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now, otherwise you can now close this window.

Author: Relius
Message: May I ask what the correct answer was?

Author: Moderator
Message: If you don't have any comments I can tell you right now, otherwise I'll tell you after your comments.

Author: Relius
Message: I think the first one was an AI, as I said, because everything was generic, anyone could have said it. And while I may have not asked all the right questions, the second one was more specific.

Author: Relius
Message: I have no further comments than that.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. The first one was actually the human.

Author: Relius
Message: Well, thank you for letting participate in this experiment. Good bye.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you very much for your help!
